alert.note: Alert for Doddridge; Pleasants; Tyler (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 02 at 2:13AM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by runoff from earlier heavy rainfall is occurring. * WHERE...A portion of northern West Virginia, including the following counties, Doddridge, Pleasants and Tyler. * WHEN...Until 900 AM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Middle Island Creek continues to rise due to excess runoff from earlier rainfall. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 209 AM EST, the automated gauge on Middle Island Creek near Middlebourne showed the creek has risen above flood stage with minor flooding likely occurring. - Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... St. Marys, Middlebourne, Alma, Arvilla, Point Lookout, Lima and Canton. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
